In a message dated 5/17/03 9:00:19 PM Central Daylight Time, 
foxmanroar1@... writes:


> This is Scourge, Child of Megatron the 1st, clone of Autobot leader Prime, 
> and Current leader of the Decepticon forces of 2023, Lower these sheilds, 
> castaway your weapons, we are here to seal the ark until the day comes when 
> our brothers may walk the earth like the giants they are." "May i tell you 
> one thing though, every autobot, Maximal, and decepticon on this side of 
> the passage has every talent needed to protect the Ark, Some for strength, 
> some for tech work, another for scouting, but i am here for one reason 
> other then leading, one reason above all...." He kneeled on one knee as his 
> shoulder mounts began humming the four slots opened and four large warheads 
> opened... they had been ment for the mountain, but he knew anybot in his 
> time would back down from being scraped by one of these things. He reached 
> behind his back and pulled out his cannon, it looked alot like primes, 
> except for one thing, it also began hissing as the piolet light kicked in 
> and the flame emerged from the barrel. Prime chose me for my brains, 
> megatron built as his own personal war machine, guess which i prefer to be. 
> He lowered his head as the missiles armed...
> 
> Grimlock was slowly walking forward as were the dino-bots, Mirage 
> intercepted them. "Guys chill o-k, i'm telling you he's just bluffing 
> whoever is in there."
> 
> Scouge looked up one last time. "Open the door in peace or were coming in 
> anyway." 
> 

"The only Scourge I know was the pathetic lacky from Unicron!" she growled. 

After a pause. "I may be willing to talk. On certain conditions! NO WHERE 
close to the Bridge! Is that clear?!" 

--part1_151.1f6c5faf.2bf85694_boundary
